2. use strong and unique passwords: ensure that your passwords are not easy to guess and contain a combination of characters, symbols, and numbers.

4. be aware of fake profiles: do not trust everyone on the internet as many people create fake profiles to gain access to personal information. always verify the credibility of the source before sharing any information.
